#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
typedef unsigned long long ULL;
ULL MOD = 10000000000283LL;

ULL totient(int n)
{
    ULL ans = n , i;
    for(i=2; i*i <= n; i++)
    {
            if(n % i == 0)
            {
                 ans -= ans/i;
                 while(n%i == 0)
                           n /= i;
            }
            if(n == 1)
                 break;
    }
    if(n > 1)
         ans -= ans/n;
    return ans;
}

ULL multiply(ULL a,ULL b)
{
    ULL ans = 0;
    while(b)
    {
            if(b&1)
            {
                   ans = (ans + a);
                   if(ans > MOD)
                          ans -= MOD;
            }
            a += a;
            if(a > MOD)
                 a -= MOD;
            b >>= 1;
    }
    return ans;
}

int main()
{
    int t,k,i,n;
    ULL ans,temp;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
              ans = totient(n);
              temp = ans;
              for(i=2 ; i <= k; i++)
              {
                     temp = multiply(temp , n);
                     ans = (ans + temp);
                     if(ans > MOD)
                            ans -= MOD;
              }
              printf("%llu\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
